alert.note: Alert for Dade; Jasper; Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 1:41AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lawrence, Greene, southeastern Jasper and southeastern Dade Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ash Grove to near Miller to near Sarcoxie. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Springfield... Willard... Mount Vernon... Strafford... Ash Grove... Fair Grove... Sarcoxie... Miller... Walnut Grove... Everton... Brookline... Stotts City... Halltown... La Russell... Hoberg... Chesapeake... Sacville... Glidewell... Ebenezer... Bassville... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 25 and 68, and between mile markers 70 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
